$$
2X \rightleftarrows X_2
$$
$$
\left \{ \begin{aligned}
\dot{X} \left ( t \right ) & = -k _ \mathrm{b} X \left ( t \right ) ^ 2 + 2 k _ d X _ 2 \left ( t \right ), \\
\dot{X _ 2} \left ( t \right ) & = \frac{1}{2} k _ \mathrm{b} X \left ( t \right ) ^ 2 - k _ d X _ 2 \left ( t \right ).
\end{aligned} \right .
$$
